LanguageData.ArtificialMetabolism.label: artificial metabolism
LanguageData.ArtificialMetabolism.description: Craft bionics that process food more safely or efficiently than a biological stomach.

ArtificialMetabolism.generalRules.rulesS.li: subject_story->developed a hunger so all-consuming that the installation of an artificial stomach was the only solution
subject_story->did not tell the Queen about the installation of the sterilizing stomach, but continued as her food tester all the same
subject_story->developed a loathing for food. A nuclear stomach heavily reduced food consumption, though the radioactivity was a nuisance

LanguageData.BrainWiring.label: brain wiring
LanguageData.BrainWiring.description: Craft brain implants that induce or prevent blunt sensations like joy or pain.

BrainWiring.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->wrote a paper about the masochist cults use of mindscrews to improve their morale
subject_story->implanted painstoppers in an assault squad. They eliminated a much larger force, but were all mortally wounded or killed
subject_story->had a joywire installed and, though happy after that, stumbled simply through life

LanguageData.CircadianInfluence.label: circadian influence
LanguageData.CircadianInfluence.description: Craft brain implants that chemically manipulate the circadian rhythm, reducing or altering the need to sleep.

CircadianInfluence.generalRules.rulesStr.li: subject_story->studied unihemispheric sleep patterns in cetaceans and proposed a new form of circadian half-cycler
subject_story->forced any applicants for city guard to receive a half-cycler, so they could stay at post indefinitely, if necessary
subject_story->studied bullfrogs and giraffes to ascertain what xenogerms would be necessary for a circadian assistance gland

LanguageData.CompactWeaponry.label: compact weaponry
LanguageData.CompactWeaponry.description: Craft compact, concealable bionic weapons which can be embedded in various body parts.

CompactWeaponry.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->was employed as a detective and was saved more than once by the concealed knee spike
subject_story->spent a summer recovering from being slashed by an escaped slave's hand talon
subject_story->was working in security, scanning visitors to the hall, when the cyborg attempted to enter

LanguageData.FleshShaping.label: flesh shaping
LanguageData.FleshShaping.description: Craft bionics which induce the reshaping of natural flesh, usually for the purposes of aesthetic enhancement or personal pleasure.

FleshShaping.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->halted the population decline on the urbworld, by distributing free love enhancers and lavish drugs
subject_story->was hired as chief flesh-shaper for an aesthetics clinic, spending [ANYPAWN_possessive] days making shapely limbs
subject_story->gathered the glitterworld children around the campfire and told horror stories about getting their non-aesthetic noses back

LanguageData.HealingFactors.label: healing factors
LanguageData.HealingFactors.description: Craft bionics that enhance natural healing processes.

HealingFactors.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->studied the Imperial royalty, to see if they had blue blood. They did not, but it did coagulate implausibly quickly
subject_story->ensured that all the pit fighters had Healing Enhancers and appropriate xenogerms, so that they could fight more often
subject_story->studied the ancient corpses found in a cryptosleep shrine and harvested rapid healing devices from them

LanguageData.MolecularAnalysis.label: molecular analysis
LanguageData.MolecularAnalysis.description: Craft bionics with molecular analyzers for assisting the immune system or analyzing food.

MolecularAnalysis.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->explained to the chefs of the cooking school that they must never get aesthetic noses, lest their gastro-analyzers fail
subject_story->had an immunoenhancer installed and so was able to walk freely in the isolation colony
subject_story->lectured on the potential hardware conflicts between bionic parts and molecular analysis implants

LanguageData.NeuralComputation.label: neural computation
LanguageData.NeuralComputation.description: Craft brain implants that assist thought and learning by use of a direct, shallow brain-computer interface.

NeuralComputation.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->knew exactly how to take out the jailor, with an EMP attack that would brain shock their learning assistant, buying time to free the prisoners
subject_story->mandated the installation of learning assistants or neurocalculators through the entire faculty
subject_story->had a learning assistant installed. It proved to be a problem later, when captured by pirates, who halted any escape attempts with EMP attacks

LanguageData.SkinHardening.label: skin hardening
LanguageData.SkinHardening.description: Craft bionic implants which induce the toughening of natural skin, producing an armor-like effect.

SkinHardening.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->researched the glands of the barkskin dryads and reasoned they could be adapted to humanity
subject_story->traveled among the stoneskin tamers of the dinoworld, studying the thick keratin plates that covered them
subject_story->worked with nanonmachine glands to thicken the human epidermis, at the expense of meeting traditional standards of beauty

LanguageData.SpecializedLimbs.label: specialized limbs
LanguageData.SpecializedLimbs.description: Craft specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor.

SpecializedLimbs.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->interviewed the indentured farmers of a feudal world, before and after their field hand installations
subject_story->watched a pit fighter equipped with a power claw face off against a miner with two drill arms
subject_story->worked as a surgeon on the rim, replacing missing arms with everything from a woodhand to a power claw

LanguageData.VenomSynthesis.label: poison synthesis
LanguageData.VenomSynthesis.description: Craft bionics that synthesize venom from internal chemical reactors for use in toxifying attacks.

VenomSynthesis.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked on chemical reactors at small scales, which could be shrunk and stored internally
subject_story->studied the waste rats of a trash world and wrote a paper on the unique toxins in their bite
subject_story->learned to love sharp little cutting edges, which could kill with a mere nick
